title: Did the uninsured son of the Medal of Honour, Duane Devin, die after refusing treatment?
subtitle: A notorious piece of junk producer published a fake Mimi on veterans with a reference to the video game character.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Duane Devin, a medalist of honour, died after being expelled from a hospital in Atlanta on the grounds that he did not have health insurance.
